security_audit.summary: This is a pure markdown template file containing no executable code. All 24 static findings are false positives: hash identifiers were misidentified as C2 keywords and cryptographic references, and a source URL was flagged as a hardcoded network endpoint. No network calls, file system access, command execution, or environment variable access exists in this skill.

content.value_statement: This template provides a starting point for creating custom Claude skills. It includes placeholder sections for skill name, description, and instructions that you can customize for your specific use case.
actual_capabilities: Provides standardized skill structure for Claude Code
Includes YAML frontmatter for metadata configuration
Contains placeholder sections for skill descriptions
Supports custom instructions and usage guidelines
limitations: This is a template file with no built-in functionality
Requires customization to create a working skill
Does not execute code or perform actions directly
Content must be written and provided by the user

best_practices: Provide clear, specific instructions that define when and how to use the skill
Include concrete examples showing typical prompts and expected outputs
Document any configuration options or prerequisites clearly
anti_patterns: Leaving the template description unchanged without adding specific skill details
Creating overly vague instructions that do not guide the AI effectively
Missing examples or use cases that help users understand skill application

faq.question: What platforms support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Each platform interprets the instructions slightly differently.

faq.question: Can I create multiple skills from this template?
faq.answer: Yes, you can create as many skills as needed by copying the template and customizing each one for different purposes.

faq.question: How do I install a skill created from this template?
faq.answer: Skills created from this template follow standard installation methods for your Claude Code installation.

faq.question: Is my data safe when using skills?
faq.answer: This template does not access files, networks, or external services. Skills created from it may have different capabilities.

faq.question: What should I include in the description field?
faq.answer: Write a concise description explaining what the skill does and when users should invoke it. Be specific about its purpose.

faq.question: How is this different from other skill templates?
faq.answer: This template provides minimal structure for maximum flexibility. It allows complete customization of skill behavior.
